name: TEDxCapeMay 2023 "Discoveries"
content: The 12th season of TEDxCapeMay where TEDx meets Cape May for "ideas worth spreading" in a place worth visiting. Licensed by TED.com, TEDxCapeMay combines the live filming of 10 outstanding presentations and performances with an open bar reception at Cape May Convention Hall on Sunday, October 15, 2023, from 1:30 pm to 6:00 pm. Since 2012, over eight million people have viewed TEDxCapeMay talks. We invite you to witness the event in person and become enriched and inspired by various timely topics. Tickets are $60 including the open bar reception and $30 for the program only. URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/1907499-0?pid=4868 Time: 1:30 PM - 6:00 PM Venue details: Cape May Convention Hall, 714 Beach Avenue, Cape May, New Jersey, 08204, United States Price: General Admission: USD 60.00
